description: The Male Farmer, Type-6 emoji is a sequence of the  Man,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-6 and  Ear of Rice emojis. These are combine
apple_vendor_description: The farmer emoji on Apple devices showcases a man with a dark skin tone, exuding an air of grounded resilience and connection to the earth. He's often depicted with practical attire and perhaps a tool, all rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges. The realistic lighting highlights the texture and depth of his appearance, symbolizing hard work, growth, and the fruits of labor, making him a fitting representation for agricultural themes or anyone dedicated to nurturing and providing.
